name: Bubble Birds POP! - Match 3 Puzzle Shooter
name_original: Bubble Birds POP! - Match 3 Puzzle Shooter
description:
Bubble Bird Shooter is the most cute bird and hit game for shoot bubble and rescue baby birds.
Match and shoot the same bubble color to help the baby birds from traps.
Bubble Birds Shoot has two modes of playing one is Puzzle which contains 120 level and second is Arcade/Endless.

How to play Shooter Birds:
- You simply tap to shoot at least three bubbles of the same color to make them burst.
- PUZZLE mode: Your mission is to shoot all the bubbles on the map to rescue trapped pets.
- ENDLESS mode: Your mission is to quickly and accurately shoot the bubbles to rescue trapped pets without - touching the line.

Features:
- Free Intuitive Puzzle bubble game play.
- Adorable shooter squirrel for pet lovers.
- Cute graphic game and smooth swipe control.
- Two puzzle game modes.
- Over 100 bubble Shooter stages.
- Colorful puzzle bubble birds with adorable design GUI.
